info.title: SoVAni Crosspost API
info.description: Cross-platform content publishing system from Telegram to social media platforms

get.description:
Health check endpoint.

Returns application health status including service dependencies.

post.description:
Telegram webhook endpoint.

Receives and processes updates from Telegram bot.

Debug publish endpoint.

Manually trigger publishing of a post to specified platforms.
Only available in development/testing environments.

get.description:
Queue monitoring endpoint.

Returns status of all Celery queues for admin monitoring.

post.description:
Authenticate user via Telegram Login Widget.
Creates new user if not exists, returns JWT token.

get.description: Get current authenticated user info.

post.description:
Send authentication code to user's Telegram.
User must have previously interacted with the bot.
Verify authentication code and return JWT token.

get.description: List user's connected social accounts.

schema.title: Response List Accounts Api V1 User Accounts Get

delete.description: Remove a social account from user.

get.description: List user's content topics.

schema.title: Response List Topics Api V1 User Topics Get

get.description: Get user statistics.

post.description: Generate an image using user's selected provider.

get.description: Get available image generation providers.
Get content plan by ID.
List user's content plans.

schema.title: Response List Plans Api V1 Content Plan  Get

post.description: Activate content plan and create scheduled posts.
Regenerate a single post in the plan.

get.description: Get video generation task status.
List user's video generation tasks.

schema.title: Response List Tasks Api V1 Video Gen Tasks Get

get.description: Get available video generation providers.
Get list of available platforms with pricing.

schema.title: Response List Platforms Api V1 Pricing Platforms Get

get.description: Get list of available image generation providers.

schema.title: Response List Image Providers Api V1 Pricing Image Providers Get

get.description: Get list of available video generation providers.

schema.title: Response List Video Providers Api V1 Pricing Video Providers Get

get.description: Get list of subscription plans.

schema.title: Response List Subscription Plans Api V1 Pricing Subscription Plans Get

get.description: Calculate estimated subscription price.
Compare image generation providers by cost.
Get quick price estimate with defaults.

Get expected folder structure for cloud storage.
Returns guide for users on how to organize their media files.

post.description:
Connect a cloud storage folder.

For public folders (Yandex Disk public links), no OAuth is needed.
For private folders, returns OAuth URL for user to authorize.

get.description:
OAuth callback handler.
Exchanges authorization code for tokens and activates connection.
List all cloud storage connections for current user.
Get details of a specific cloud connection.

post.description: Manually trigger sync for a cloud connection.

get.description: List files synced from a cloud connection.

parameters.name: media_type

schema.description: Filter by media type: video or image
schema.title: Media Type

parameters.description: Filter by media type: video or image

get.description: List supported cloud storage providers.

List fraud events with filtering.

Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Fraud Events Api V1 Admin Fraud Events Get

get.description:
Get fraud statistics for dashboard.

Admin only.

List blocked IPs.

Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Blocked Ips Api V1 Admin Fraud Blocked Ips Get

post.description:
Block an IP address.

Admin only.

delete.description:
Unblock an IP address.

Admin only.

get.description:
List rate limit overrides.

Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Rate Limit Overrides Api V1 Admin Fraud Rate Limits Get

post.description:
Create a rate limit override.

Use to increase or decrease limits for specific users/IPs.
Admin only.

delete.description:
Delete a rate limit override.

Admin only.

post.description:
Manually check fraud risk for a user.

Admin only.
